title: League client crashes at same time every night
body: Every single night at around 9-10pm Pacific Time, my client stops letting me play --  I'll crash during games, will be dodged during Champ Select because the timer gets stuck at 0, and when I restart client it takes for EVER to try to Authorize and ends up telling me that I need to Exit the client instead. This only happens during that time and I don't know what to do about it, it's really annoying and I already tried re-installing / doing all the other "Stuck Authorizing" tips admin keeps giving people even though it keeps not working. Does anyone know what I should do?

replies.body: I don't want to jump to any conclusions, but it kinda of sounds like that might be happening from your ISP doing a quick reset nightly. Crashing in champion select is almost always caused by your connection cutting out for a split second. If you can, call your provider really quick to ask if there's any regular maintenance going on around those times and let me know what they say!
